title: Making Believe Womens Short Sleeve Peasant Gypsy Blouse - White (Choose Size)
features: Includes one womens long sleeve gypsy blouse
Fun for Halloween costumes and dress up: gypsy, pirate wench, renaissance, peasant, medieval
description: Versatile white blouse is designed to be a costume basic to create a variety of different characters for Halloween, stage and theater use. Historical style costume has so many uses for renaissance, medieval, peasant, pirate, civil war, gypsy or other period theme apparel. Made of basic white polyester fabric. Use cool iron as needed. This costume blouse comes in sizes to fit teens to adults. Machine wash cold, lay flat to dry to avoid shrinkage. Imported. Size Small dimensions: Shirt length from shoulder to hem is approx. 26" , Sleeve length 20" and Chest circumference is approx. 42" Size Medium dimensions: Shirt length from shoulder to hem is approx. 28", Sleeve length 21" and Chest circumference is approx. 44" Size Large dimensions: Shirt length from shoulder to hem is approx. 28", Sleeve length 23" and Chest circumference is approx. 46" Size X-Large dimensions: Shirt length from shoulder to hem is approx. 30", Sleeve length 24" and Chest circumference is approx. 48"
